channel.title: [Delta] Command Help

item.title: [Delta] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“neroxx, post:6, topic:424557”]when i add this command:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if(c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot use this command whilst you are in the Wilderness."); } else { c.teleportToX = 3088; c.teleportToY = 3488; c.sendMessage("You teleport Home"); } }

i getting this error:

.\org\model\commands\Commands.java:85: error: cannot find symbol if(client.isInWild()) { ^ symbol: method isInWild() location: variable client of type Client 1 error (this is an delta) it is deltascape[/quote]

Twice just there ^.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

Try this command that I have for my server:

if (playerCommand.equals("home")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3087, 3493, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("You teleport to home"); } else if(c.inWild() && c.wildLevel > Config.NO_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL){ c.sendMessage("You can't teleport above level "+Config.NO_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL+" in the wilderness."); }

This is for project insanity source. If yours is another type of source, I can’t help you sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Medi Medi
item.description:
@Medi wrote:

Here it is for anyone using a PI base - 100% credits to The Outsider

			if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) {
        if(c.inWild()) {
                c.sendMessage("You cannot use this command whilst you are in the Wilderness.");
        } else {
                c.teleportToX = 3088;
                c.teleportToY = 3488;
                c.sendMessage("You teleport Home");
        }
}

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

In Player class you should have something like “public void isInWild() {”. Find the correct name before doing anything else and then add it like so:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if(client.isInWild()) { client.sM("You cannot use this command whilst you are in the Wilderness."); } else { client.toX = 3088; client.toY = 3488; client.sM("You teleport Home"); } }

Read full topic
